description.ruby-sapphire:
Attacks with a burst of
light. May lower SP. DEF.
description.emerald:
Attacks with a burst of
light. May lower SP. DEF.
description.firered-leafgreen:
A burst of light
injures the foe. It
may also lower the
foe’s SP. DEF.
description.diamond-pearl:
The user looses a
damaging burst of
light. It may also
reduce the target’s
Sp. Def stat.

effect.full: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a $effect_chance% chance to lower the target's Special Defense by one stage.
